text: Luciano Fabio Stirati (15 December 1922 â€“ 25 July 2020) was an Italian politician. Stirati was born in Gubbio, Italy. Republished as: He represented the Italian Socialist Party for two nonconsecutive terms. He was a member of the Senate, from 1963 to 1968, and from 1972 to 1976. Stirati died on 25 July 2020 at a hospital in the Province of Perugia at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Umbria
title: Luciano Fabio Stirati
